name: Parthenium escoba amargo

Head: Disordered vision
Eyes heavy; eyeballs ache
Aching in teeth
Teeth feel on edge; too long
Tinnitus and pain in ears
Aches, extending to nose; feels swelled; pain in frontal eminence
Ringing in ears
Pain at root of nose; feels swollen

details: A Cuban remedy for fevers, especially malarial. Increased flow of milk. Amenorrhoea and general debility. Cheyne-Stokes breathing. After Quinine.
